name: GAIN
description: The job is simple: Dont die! GAIN is an arcade style stealth game with perma-death. Freeze guards, slow time and collect the documents in seven frustrating levels without dying. Classic stealth game with no saves. Once you die, its back to the beginning....
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 and above Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Dedicated Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 and above Processor: 2.8Ghz Quad Core or Higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R9 270 or Nvidia GeForce 760 or Higher Storage: 4 GB available space
